sentences.en: " Come on, unbutton your shirt, let me see. "
sentences.cn: “ 快点, 把衬衫钮扣解开, 让我看看. ”

sentences.en: He took off his sweater and unbut­toned his shirt.
sentences.cn: 他脱去毛衣，解开衬衫的扣子。

sentences.en: It's too hot inside the room, so he has to unbutton his coat to cool down.
sentences.cn: 室里太热了, 他只好松解衣扣凉快一下.

sentences.en: Please unbutton your blouse and loosen your belt.
sentences.cn: 请解开上衣的扣子,松开腰带.

sentences.en: Please unbutton your shirt and let me examine you.
sentences.cn: 请解开衬衫,让我检查一下.

sentences.en: She had begun to unbutton her blouse.
Step aside here and unbutton your vest please.
sentences.cn: 请您到这边来一下,解开马夹纽扣.

sentences.en: Take your shoes off and unbutton your shirt please.
sentences.cn: 请脱下鞋子,解开衬衣的扣子.

sentences.en: Unbutton your blouse and let me listen to your heart.
sentences.cn: 解开衬衫钮扣,让我听听你的心脏.

sentences.en: Unbutton your coat and lift It'slightly when driving to avoid friction.
sentences.cn: 开车时,脱掉皮草衣服,轻轻地挂在一边避免摩擦.

sentences.en: Unbutton your shirt and let me listen to your lung.
sentences.cn: 解开衬衫钮扣,让我听听你的肺.

sentences.en: Unbutton your shirt and let me listen to your lungs.
sentences.cn: 解开衬衫纽扣,让我听听的肺.

words.tran_cn: 钮扣解开的；无拘束的；放松的

trans.tran_cn: 解开（纽扣），打开，表露，吐露
trans.tran_en: to undo the buttons on a piece of clothing
